title: Astilbin ameliorates intracerebral hemorrhage-induced secondary brain injury by upregulating Treg cells in mice.
abstract: Intracerebral Hemorrhage (ICH) is a common acute fatal cerebrovascular disease in surgery. Astilbin, a flavonoid extracted from various plants, has been studied for its excellent anti-inflammatory action. The present study aims to investigate the efficacy and mechanism of astilbin against ICH in mice.
